title: Combine
text: Combine the radicals into one radical, since $$\frac{\sqrt{a}}{\sqrt{b}}$$ $$=$$ $$\sqrt{\frac{a}{b}}$$

title: Simplify
text: Now, simplify the quotient under the radical as much as possible.

title: Reduce
text: If necessary, simplify the radical further by splitting it apart and reducing it to a constant and another radical.
